attributes.action: David Cameron to resign as Prime Minister.
attributes.background:
We the Great British Tax payers call on David Cameron to resign as Prime Minister.
He has admitted he did hold shares in an offshore tax haven fund. This was days after he denied having direct involvement in the Panama Papers scandal.
RESIGN now Cameron,and you do it as soon as possible!.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
